mapper.select: SELECT * from cartItem where cartId = #{cartId} and bookNo=#{bookNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cartItem(id, quantity, totalPrice, cartId, bookNo) values(seq_cartItemId.nextval, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, #{cartId}, #{bookNo})
mapper.update: update cartItem set quantity = quantity+#{quantity}, totalPrice = (quantity+#{quantity})*#{price} where cartId=#{cartId} and bookNo=#{bookNo}
update cartItem set quantity = quantity-#{quantity}, totalPrice = (quantity-#{quantity})*#{price} where cartId=#{cartId} and bookNo=#{bookNo}
mapper.delete: delete from cartItem where cartId = #{cartId} and bookNo = #{bookNo}
